Class StationDetailsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class StationDetailsActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    Activity displays a selected station's details including map image and pricing.
    See Also:
    SearchResultsActivity

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        onCreate

        Generates the context and sets it to the savedInstanceState it also maintains shared preferences.

        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - (required)

      • setLogo

        private void setLogo()
        Sets the station logo icon, which is retrieved based on the station logo id.

      • getPriceSummary

        private void getPriceSummary()
        Takes user input of fuel type and number of gallons to purchase, and updates the priceSummary view with the pump price and adjusted price for that fuel. If the number of gallons is not provided, the price display with show no adjusted cost.
        See Also:
        getFuelSelection(int selectedFuel), setPriceDisplays(double price, double numGallons)

      • getFuelSelection

        private FuelPrice getFuelSelection(int position)
        Retrieves the desired fuel type price from the station.
        Parameters:
        position - the selected item position in the fuelType spinner menu.
        Returns:
        FuelPrice

      • setPriceDisplays

        private void setPriceDisplays(FuelPrice price,
                    double gallons)
        Computes the adjusted pump price for a fuel type, and then sets the priceSummary view with the fuel price and adjusted price.
        Parameters:
        price - price of the selected fuel type
        gallons - number of gallons to be purchased
        See Also:
        setPriceDisplays(double fuelPrice, double adjustPrice)

      • setPriceDisplays

        private void setPriceDisplays(double fuelPrice,
                    double adjustPrice)
        Sets the priceSummary view with the fuel price and adjusted price. If either price is set to 0, the value is shown as "Not available"
        Parameters:
        fuelPrice - price of the selected fuel type
        adjustPrice - the adjusted pump price

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        Sets up the menu option for adding or removing the station as a favorite. If the station is not a favorite, an empty star is displayed. If the station is already a favorite, then a yellow-filled star is displayed.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class android.app.Activity
        Returns:
        true if the menu is created successfully

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
        Overrides the Activity onOptionsItemSelected method, handles clicking the home button or the favorites star.
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        item - the selected menu item
